about_the_game:
🎃 THIS HALLOWEEN, THE SCARY HUMANS ARE OUT TO GET YOU! 🎃

Scary Humans: The Revamped Nightmare: We've supercharged your favorite survival horror game with a shiny new engine, even more jumpscares, and enough spooky surprises to make your heart race! Greenlit by the Steam community in record time, we're blending 80s nostalgia with modern-day terror. Face brutal challenges and if you slip up, it's back to the beginning. Can you brave all 6 revamped, terror-filled levels? Dive in if you dare, but we won't be held accountable for the nightmares that follow...

Meet Mrgrt, our little alien from the vowel-less planet Flrws. Once a captive lab rat for the sinister humans, a Friday 13th virus outbreak gave him a shot at freedom. The chase is on, and the stakes have never been higher. Can YOU lead him to safety?

Killer Features & What's Fresh


  • New and improved game engine: smoother, darker, and packed with more chills.
  • Memory boost: Rooms and enemies remember you. There's no escaping their wrath.
  • Immersive room transitions: Dive deeper into the unfolding horror.
  • Navigate with ease using our revamped map: Your lifeline in this house of horrors.
  • More of EVERYTHING: more challenges, more foes, and more terror!
  • Unpredictable labyrinths: Every replay is a fresh descent into madness.
  • Face off against eerie human types: swift runners, bulky chubbies, and the relentless regulars, all more terrifying than before.
  • Unlock spine-tingling achievements: Can you conquer the game's darkest challenges?
  • Collect color-coded cards to navigate through the nightmarish doors.
  • Groove to an 80s-inspired horror soundtrack that would even give John Carpenter the creeps.
  • Race against the clock: Every ticking second is a step closer to doom or deliverance.
  • Quick-start tutorial: Learn the ropes, then prepare to face the terror.
  • Vintage vibes, modern thrills: Get hooked from the first scream.
  • Countless hours of unrelenting horror and fun!

It's time to step out of the shadows. Make those creepy humans rue the day they messed with you! With Scary Humans' latest updates, every playthrough promises fresh fear. And as you climb the levels, the terror only intensifies.

This Halloween, humanity is the ultimate horror. Run. Hide. Survive... If you can.
detailed_description:
🎃 THIS HALLOWEEN, THE SCARY HUMANS ARE OUT TO GET YOU! 🎃

Scary Humans: The Revamped Nightmare: We've supercharged your favorite survival horror game with a shiny new engine, even more jumpscares, and enough spooky surprises to make your heart race! Greenlit by the Steam community in record time, we're blending 80s nostalgia with modern-day terror. Face brutal challenges and if you slip up, it's back to the beginning. Can you brave all 6 revamped, terror-filled levels? Dive in if you dare, but we won't be held accountable for the nightmares that follow...

Meet Mrgrt, our little alien from the vowel-less planet Flrws. Once a captive lab rat for the sinister humans, a Friday 13th virus outbreak gave him a shot at freedom. The chase is on, and the stakes have never been higher. Can YOU lead him to safety?

Killer Features & What's Fresh


  • New and improved game engine: smoother, darker, and packed with more chills.
  • Memory boost: Rooms and enemies remember you. There's no escaping their wrath.
  • Immersive room transitions: Dive deeper into the unfolding horror.
  • Navigate with ease using our revamped map: Your lifeline in this house of horrors.
  • More of EVERYTHING: more challenges, more foes, and more terror!
  • Unpredictable labyrinths: Every replay is a fresh descent into madness.
  • Face off against eerie human types: swift runners, bulky chubbies, and the relentless regulars, all more terrifying than before.
  • Unlock spine-tingling achievements: Can you conquer the game's darkest challenges?
  • Collect color-coded cards to navigate through the nightmarish doors.
  • Groove to an 80s-inspired horror soundtrack that would even give John Carpenter the creeps.
  • Race against the clock: Every ticking second is a step closer to doom or deliverance.
  • Quick-start tutorial: Learn the ropes, then prepare to face the terror.
  • Vintage vibes, modern thrills: Get hooked from the first scream.
  • Countless hours of unrelenting horror and fun!

It's time to step out of the shadows. Make those creepy humans rue the day they messed with you! With Scary Humans' latest updates, every playthrough promises fresh fear. And as you climb the levels, the terror only intensifies.

This Halloween, humanity is the ultimate horror. Run. Hide. Survive... If you can.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5570 / NVidia 260 / Intel HD 4400
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9.5 (Maverick), 10.10 (Yosemite), 10.11 (El Capitan), 10.12 (Sierra)
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo (Dual-Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3870 / NVIDIA 330M / Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Support wired Xbox One and Xbox 360 controllers for Windows.

name: Scary Humans

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 3800+
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 6800 GT @ 512MB / ATI® Radeon™ X1900XT @ 512MB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Sound Card

short_description: 🎃 Dive into 'Scary Humans' this Halloween! A turbo-charged survival game with 80s retro vibes. Face relentless levels, outsmart sinister humans, and escape a twisted MIC. Are you brave enough to survive the nightmare? 🎮👻
